title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
description: A classic 35mm rangefinder camera known for its precision and durability. Highly sought after by collectors and photography enthusiasts.

title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
description: Iconic solid-body electric guitar with a rich, resonant tone. A favorite of rock legends like Angus Young and Eric Clapton.

title: Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984)
description: The groundbreaking first Macintosh computer with a 9-inch CRT display. A rare piece of tech history in working condition.

title: Rolex Submariner 16610
description: Timeless stainless steel dive watch with a black dial and rotating bezel. A symbol of luxury and precision craftsmanship.

title: First Edition 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: Rare 1925 first printing of the American literary classic. Features the original dust jacket and gilt-edged pages.

title: Mid-Century Modern Eames Lounge Chair
description: Iconic 1956 design with molded plywood and leather upholstery. A masterpiece of comfort and minimalist aesthetics.

title: Banksy Original Screen Print
description: Authentic limited-edition artwork by the anonymous street artist. Comes with a certificate of provenance.
